verses.roman:
nityānanda-mukhe śuni' gopāla-carita
tuṣṭa hailā mahāprabhu svabhakta-sahita

synonyms: nityānanda-mukhe—from the mouth of Lord Nityānanda Prabhu; śuni'-hearing; gopāla-carita—the narration of Gopāla; tuṣṭa hailā—became very pleased; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sva-bhakta-sahita—with His devotees.
translation: Thus Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu heard the narration of Gopāla's activities. Both He and His personal devotees became very pleased.
